remarks.para: May be missing with no penalty.

note.para: Refer to MEL items 33-44-1-1, 33-44-1-2, 33-44-1-3 for dispatch requirements.

When a lens is missing, disconnect, cap and stow the electrical connector. Remove the light bulb, reflector, lens cover and lens cover support. With the rest of the light assembly intact, cover the opening with appropriate material (Speed Tape, for example).
